title: "AI-equipped backpack designed for the blind 'speaks' to provide users with directions to help them navigate without the need of guide dog or cane"
excerpt: "The AI backpack detects cars, curbs, branches and other challenges using a vest camera. Users get directions from an earphone, while a battery in a fanny pack provides eight hours of energy."
